name: LuckyBoy and PrettyGirl Attack
description:
Zombies are invading our world and They were kidnapped
you PrettyGirl , SO The only chance we have is to call the LuckyBoy to defend us from this attack. Your mission is to lead the LuckyBoy and kill all zombie In The Games.


Game Features :

* Good Music
* Easy for children and enjoyable play for all ages
* 6 World .
* Great and clear graphic design and animations.
* Different types of zombies (Small, Large, fast, shooter ...)


Enjoy playing our LuckyBoy And PrettyGirl Attack games.
